byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+

Purchase this BMW Ultimate Care upgrade to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

Price - $600 across the board for all 2017 model/series

Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+ and BMW Ultimate Care+1 Bundle

Purchase BMW Ultimate Care+ to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model
year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

With purchasing this bundle, you will also extend your coverage with BMW Ultimate Care+1 for an additional 1 year or 14,000 miles for a total of 4 years or 50,000 miles.


Price: BMW UC+ $600 + BMW UC+1 price (which differs per 2017 model/series)
See attached price sheet


Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.disclaimer: Disclaimer:  Pricing excludes Bosch Home Installation Services.  Please contact your local BMW i Center to learn more or to request a no cost quote for BMW Installation Services from Bosch.
byooption.longDescription:
The BMW Charging Station combines BMW i award-winning design with reliable, convenient home charging.  Offered exclusively at BMW Centers, with the added ease of available financing, the BMW Charging Station is the sensible choice.

This wall-mounted charging station reduces charging time for the BMW i3 to approximately 3.5 hours (7kW at 240v). Plus, with the provided 25 foot cable, you will have the flexibility to charge from your preferred location. 
Charging is simple: just plug in and charging begins immediately.   BMW Installation Services, provided by BMW partner Bosch Automotive Service Solutions, are recommended for the BMW Charging Station.  This concierge-style home installation includes tailored management of all aspects of the installation process, from a no-cost custom quote to full installation service and training.
byooption.name: BMW Charging Station

byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2017 BMW i3 Range Extender models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $329 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $37,742 (MSRP of $50,995, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $3,000 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $2,753 and $7,500 Lease Credit).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual monthly lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $3,000 down payment, $329 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.25/mile over 30,000 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $29,577.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

byooption.longDescription: 2-way power glass moonroof with 1-touch operation slides back or tilts up to let in as much fresh air and sky as you like, while a wind deflector helps keep strong breezes out.

byooption.longDescription: Introducing a sound experience that's as remarkable as the BMW i driving experience itself. Unlike traditional stereo systems, optional Harman Kardon surround sound audio uses vehicle-specific equalizing and a 360W amplifier to deliver powerful, high-current, ultrawide-bandwidth. The result: a scintillating audio performance that pumps the highest definition soundtrack to the open road. This 12-speaker system also includes four tweeters, four mid-range speakers, two bass speakers, one mid-range speaker, and one tweeter in the instrument panel.
byooption.name: Harman Kardon surround sound system

options.description: Introducing a sound experience that's as remarkable as the BMW i driving experience itself. Unlike traditional stereo systems, optional Harman Kardon surround sound audio uses vehicle-specific equalizing and a 360W amplifier to deliver powerful, high-current, ultrawide-bandwidth. The result: a scintillating audio performance that pumps the highest definition soundtrack to the open road. This 12-speaker system also includes four tweeters, four mid-range speakers, two bass speakers, one mid-range speaker, and one tweeter in the instrument panel.
options.name: Harman Kardon surround sound system

byooption.longDescription: Make parking a breeze with the Parking Assistant Package. A Rear view camera lets you see clearly behind the vehicle, while Park Distance Control provides visual and audio warnings as you approach an object.
byooption.name: Parking Assistance Package

packages.description: Make parking a breeze with the Parking Assistant Package. A Rear view camera lets you see clearly behind the vehicle, while Park Distance Control provides visual and audio warnings as you approach an object.
packages.name: Parking Assistance Package

byooption.longDescription: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command. Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering as you select the correct gear and control the accelerator and brake.
byooption.name: Parking Assistant

options.description: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command. Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering as you select the correct gear and control the accelerator and brake.
options.name: Parking Assistant

byooption.longDescription: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
byooption.name: Park Distance Control

options.description: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
options.name: Park Distance Control

byooption.longDescription: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. Working in conjunction with Park Distance Control, interactive guidelines can indicate lines that represent the vehicle’s actual path when backing up, as well as the optimal steering angle.
byooption.name: Rear view camera

options.description: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. Working in conjunction with Park Distance Control, interactive guidelines can indicate lines that represent the vehicle’s actual path when backing up, as well as the optimal steering angle.
options.name: Rear view camera

byooption.longDescription: The Parking Assistance Package offers easy parking and worry-free aid with the use of Park Distance Control in the front, a camera in the rear, and a fully-automatic option, which allows the BMW i3 to accelerate, brake, and steer itself, for the ultimate added convenience.
byooption.name: Park Assistant Package

options.description: The Parking Assistance Package offers easy parking and worry-free aid with the use of Park Distance Control in the front, a camera in the rear, and a fully-automatic option, which allows the BMW i3 to accelerate, brake, and steer itself, for the ultimate added convenience.
options.name: Park Assistant Package

byooption.longDescription: Tap into the convenience of the latest in driver assist technology. Includes advanced features like Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go, which lets you maintain your selected speed and uses radar to bring your vehicle to a complete stop; BMW Navigation System with its split-screen display; BMW Online and BMW App to access social networks, on-demand music and location-sharing; and BMW Connected App Compatibility, which lets you plan your trips from end-to-end by sending destinations from your phone or watch to your BMW.
byooption.name: Technology + Driving Assistant Package

packages.description: Tap into the convenience of the latest in driver assist technology. Includes advanced features like Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go, which lets you maintain your selected speed and uses radar to bring your vehicle to a complete stop; BMW Navigation System with its split-screen display; BMW Online and BMW App to access social networks, on-demand music and location-sharing; and BMW Connected App Compatibility, which lets you plan your trips from end-to-end by sending destinations from your phone or watch to your BMW.
packages.name: Technology + Driving Assistant Package

byooption.longDescription: The Navigation System for the BMW i3, with its BMW i ConnectedDrive Services, was specifically developed for making driving as easy and convenient as possible. At the heart of BMW i is the range assistant with dynamic range map. This takes into account all relevant factors for routing: battery charge level, driving style, traffic situation and topographical condition of the route, and shows the most efficient road based on these factors. All this to ensure that you reach your planned destination as quickly as possible with the current battery charge.
byooption.name: Navigation system

options.description: The Navigation System for the BMW i3, with its BMW i ConnectedDrive Services, was specifically developed for making driving as easy and convenient as possible. At the heart of BMW i is the range assistant with dynamic range map. This takes into account all relevant factors for routing: battery charge level, driving style, traffic situation and topographical condition of the route, and shows the most efficient road based on these factors. All this to ensure that you reach your planned destination as quickly as possible with the current battery charge.
options.name: Navigation system

byooption.longDescription: Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go maintains your selected speed; it also uses radar to keep your preselected distance from the vehicle ahead and bring your vehicle to a complete stop, if needed - a useful feature in stop-and-go traffic. Also included is Collision Mitigation: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes quickly engage.  Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection.  These camera- and radar-based systems help prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
byooption.name: ACC Stop & Go + Active Driving Assistant

options.description: Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go maintains your selected speed; it also uses radar to keep your preselected distance from the vehicle ahead and bring your vehicle to a complete stop, if needed - a useful feature in stop-and-go traffic. Also included is Collision Mitigation: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes quickly engage.  Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection.  These camera- and radar-based systems help prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
options.name: ACC Stop & Go + Active Driving Assistant

byooption.longDescription: Enhances your mobility by connecting you to the most up-to-date information while you are at the wheel.  Business and stock market news, weather updates are made available.  With services such as Google Local Search you have access to telephone directories, restaurant and hotel guides.  You receive exclusive, location-based information on everything you need to know about your route or destination.
byooption.name: BMW Online and BMW Apps

With services such as Google Local Search you have access to telephone directories, restaurant and hotel guides.  You receive exclusive, location-based information on everything you need to know about your route or destination.
options.name: BMW Online and BMW Apps

byooption.longDescription: Added to Navigation option, ARTTI now offers more coverage and precision using an extensive sensor network and vehicle’s mobile network data connections bring this information to vehicle faster.
byooption.name: Advanced Real-Time Traffic Information
